nodes.text: Turgot Mynes was an individual who died from the heat of the desert planet Jakku while working there as a scavenger sometime prior to the First Order's attack on the village of Tuanul. Another scavenger named Rey included Mynes alongside Paos Adina and Binz Scoty in a list of scavengers who had messed up and died from the heat in her journal, where she vowed to not meet the same fate.
Turgot Mynes was first mentioned in the replica journal Rey's Survival Guide, which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2015.
